resources.string: Could not download address. Check your internet connection and try again
The shared link was not a valid Google Maps link
There was no valid URL in the shared link

Due to a bug in the new version of Google Maps, a blank address was just shared from Google Maps to the Send To Car app.

You can work around this bug by searching for an address in the Google Maps app using the search bar instead of long-pressing on the map.

Please write to Google that this bug affects you.

Open the Google Maps app, pull open the panel to the left and click Send feedback.

Write something like: "When long-pressing on the map then pressing the Share button, the shared Google Maps link doesn't point to any location."

Sorry for the inconvenience.

- Julien Vanier

Due to a bug in the new version of Google Maps, an incomplete address was just shared from Google Maps to the Send To Car app. It contains the street address, but not the city, state and country so Send To Car cannot find your destination.

You can sometimes work around this bug by searching for a street, city and state in the Google Maps app using the search bar. You can also search for a business near your destination.

Please write to Google that this bug affects you.

Open the Google Maps app, pull open the panel to the left and click Send feedback.

Write something like: "When searching for a street address then pressing the Share button, the new Google Maps shares an incomplete address without city and state."

Sorry for the inconvenience.

- Julien Vanier
Could not send the destination because your device is not connected to the internet.
Could not load the address because your device is not connected to the internet.
App not started from the Google Maps share menu. See help for details.
Could not send the destination. Try again later
In your car, press "Sync" and say "Services" to download the destination
Follow the instructions on this page to finish sending your destination
Invalid account. Check that you entered it correctly and try again
This destination cannot be sent to your car. Try a different destination
No app is available to do this
Step-by-step guide to use the app
If you like this app, please rate it!
If you have issues with this app, you can email the developer
Start Google Maps, find a place and slide the white address box up
